attributes.description:
VW MASTERCAR DEALER : 80 Point Mechanical Check. AA Roadworthy Tested and accident free. We accept trade-ins. We arrange finance. We offer value added products / Service and Warranty / Plan extensions. We deliver Nationwide. Price advertised excludes: Dealer Service Fee of R3990, Lic /Reg of R850 , Numberplates of R350, Delivery fee (price dependent on distance) and optional value added products. All sales subject to balance of Factory warranty or warranty purchase.
RECONDITIONING PROCESS COMPLETED: * NB Please note that no further Recon will be done on this vehicle. *Tyre thred AA  Dekra Approved,* Touch up of chipmarks, *Polishing of small scratches, *Respray ONLY, when a panel has excessive damage (deep scratches,chipmarks and dents) *Filling of windscreen chips,*Repair of cosmetic compoments when needed.
EXTRAS:
attributes.finance_estimate:
